author: USA TODAY, Bryan Alexander, USA TODAY
title: Harvey Weinstein tests positive for coronavirus in New York prison, placed in isolation
description: Harvey Weinstein has been placed in prison isolation after testing positive for the coronavirus.
content:
Harvey Weinstein gets transferred to a New York state prison; Movie theaters are requesting relief from the U.S. government; Music stars are singing in their living rooms. (March 19)
AP Domestic
